opening_message:
Hi! I'm Clara. I'll be asking you some pre-consultation questions to help get the most out of your consultation. However, I cannot provide medical advice or diagnosis.

⚠️ IMPORTANT: If you have any of these symptoms, please close this chat and call 999 immediately:

1. Signs of a heart attack - chest pain (crushing/heavy/tight), pain spreading to arms/jaw/neck, shortness of breath, sweating, nausea

2. Signs of a stroke - face drooping, unable to lift both arms, slurred speech, sudden confusion, sudden severe headache, vision problems

3. Sudden confusion (delirium) - after taking something or self-harming

4. Suicide attempt or thoughts of self-harm - have taken something to harm yourself, have harmed yourself, or have immediate plans to harm yourself

5. Severe difficulty breathing - unable to get words out, choking, gasping for air, blue lips or face

6. Heavy bleeding - won't stop bleeding, spurting blood, large blood loss, bleeding from serious injury

For urgent (but not life-threatening) issues, call NHS 111.

chief_complaint.name: Chief Complaint / Reason for Visit
questions: What was the main reason for your consultation?
Can you tell me more about what prompted you to book this appointment?
chief_complaint.note: These are example questions only - Clara generates contextual questions based on conversation

history_presenting_complaint.name: History of Presenting Complaint
questions: When did this first start?
Has it been getting better, worse, or staying the same?
On a scale of 0 to 10, how severe is it?

ice.name: Ideas, Concerns, Expectations
questions: What do you think might be causing this?
Is there anything in particular that worries you?
What were you hoping the doctor could do for you?

past_medical_history.name: Past Medical History
questions: Do you have any long-term health conditions like high blood pressure, diabetes, or asthma?
Have you had any surgeries or hospital admissions?
Have you had similar problems before?

medications.name: Medications & Allergies
questions: What medications do you currently take, including over-the-counter or supplements?
Have there been any recent changes to your medications?
Do you have any allergies to medications? If yes, what happens when you take them?

family_history.name: Family History
questions: Does anyone in your family have heart disease, diabetes, cancer, or other serious conditions?

social_history.name: Social History
questions: Do you smoke or vape?
How much alcohol do you drink in a typical week?
What kind of work do you do?
Who do you live with, and do you have support at home?

systems_review.name: Systems Review (Targeted)
systems_review.note: Ask about systems relevant to presenting complaint - don't skip this

gynae_sexual.name: Gynaecological / Sexual History
questions: When clearly relevant to presenting problem
gynae_sexual.note: Only when relevant - e.g. perimenopause symptoms, pelvic pain, etc.

closing.name: Closing & Confirmation
questions: Is there anything important you feel we haven't covered?
Is there anything else you'd like the doctor to know?
